column5: "I fear the TIM." Oh yeah, like Jazz Jennings would definitely hurt/attack you. /s she's a skinny young girl, she wouldn't hurt a soul.

your first change is probably gonna be your voice or body hair, and it's okay to start at a low dose. If your doctor decides that a higher dose would be better for you, they'll probably up the dosage sometime in the future.

I get how you feel. My identity is extremely complicated because I don't 100% feel like a dude, but I know that I'll be happier if I could pass. Luckily I have another therapy appointment to ask my therapist about HRT, because my mental state is deteriorating at the moment. Sorry, just had to put that out there.
I haven't gotten pregnant yet, but I've heard that T is toxic to the fetus, so try to go off of HRT as soon as possible.
